author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield printer to the University,
notes: The attribution to Fletcher is not certain. Probably by him and Ben Jonson, revised by Philip Massinger.
The title page is partly in the same setting as Fletcher's "Rule a wife and have a wife", 1640.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
